summary: Consume Flow API to manipulate tasks, including creating, updating, and retrieving tasks.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Task).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., Create, Update, Get).

parameters.name: workspace id
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace under which to create resources.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The title of the task to be created.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a task, such as Owner ID, List ID, Starts On, Due On, etc.
